title: Instruction Frontmatter
description: Validates the YAML frontmatter of instruction files in .project/instructions/. Instructions provide domain-specific guidance loaded via progressive disclosure based on applies_to patterns and activation settings.

applies_to.description: Glob patterns for files and paths that trigger loading this instruction (e.g., ["src/server/**", "**/*.go"]).

priority.description: Numeric priority for ordering instructions. Higher values take precedence.

activation.description: How this instruction is activated. 'auto' loads when context matches, 'manual' requires explicit request, 'always' loads at session start.

include.description: Only load this instruction for these providers.

exclude.description: Never load this instruction for these providers.
